Project.Brief history of your project and organi:
“来也科技”

With the vision of “Empowering Everyone with Intelligent Agents,” Laiye Technology envisions a future where human employees and digital employees collaborate to transform productivity, unleash creativity, and help organizations and individuals perform better and become better. Our core product is an integrated digital workforce platform that acts as an intelligent assistant for employees, significantly enhancing productivity and helping enterprises build a truly digital workforce.

The platform integrates a wide range of capabilities required by digital employees. It combines native AI technologies and large language models to make digital employees more intelligent. Together with enterprise-level and platform-level services such as Laiye RPA (Robotic Process Automation), Laiye IDP (Intelligent Document Processing), Laiye Chatbot, and RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation), it fully meets enterprise data security and compliance requirements, accelerating the digital transformation of government and enterprise sectors.

In 2021, we completed a C+ funding round of $50 million and established our Asia-Pacific headquarters in Singapore.
In 2022, we secured $70 million in C++ funding and launched the world’s first intelligent automation experience center in the Gulou Software Park, Fuzhou.
In 2023, we released a digital workforce platform empowered by large language models.
In 2024, we launched three high-value, practical AI Agent digital employee products and solutions based on our digital workforce platform.
Project.Describe the data being stored onto File:
1.Publicly available data related to the robotic process automation (RPA) product line, such as product documentation, training data, etc.
2.Backup data generated by the chatbot system.
3.Operational data from the digital workforce platform.
4.Foundational AI datasets and training data.
5.Promotional materials related to company operations.
6.Backup of video content published on media platforms.
Project.How do you plan to prepare the dataset:
1.I will contact our company’s technical department to categorize the data according to different departments.
2.I will use ZIP tools to compress the categorized data.
3.The data will be transferred using HTTP transmission methods.
